sentences.sContent: What turns a man of the cloth into an archaeologist?
sentences.sContent_eng: What turns a man of the cloth into an archaeologist?
sentences.sCn: 是什么让一个牧师变成了考古学家？

sentences.sContent: He's an archaeologist and has been on a dig in Crete for the past year.
sentences.sContent_eng: He's an archaeologist and has been on a dig in Crete for the past year.
sentences.sCn: 他是位考古学家，过去的一年都在参与克里特岛上的一项考古发掘工作。

words.tran: [古] 考古学的；[古] 考古学上的
